title: Visualize 2D Arrays with Matplotlib
description: Matplotlib is a popular data visualization library in Python. It can be used to create a variety of different types of plots and charts. One of the functions provided by Matplotlib is matshow(), which can be used to visualize a 2D matrix or array as a color-coded image. In this lab, we will go through the steps to use matshow() to visualize a 2D array.

meta.title: Visualize 2D Arrays with Matplotlib
